about_the_game:
After seven years of intensive development, we are happy to share our heart's project with you. As two friends, we have designed every aspect of this game with dedication and passion, always with the goal of achieving maximum gaming fun. We have carefully thought through and optimized every feature to create an experience that will captivate and inspire you.

Basically, Brothers of Battle supports both a LAN mode and the online function via Steam and can be played with up to 20 players.
You can choose between 8 different maps, each of which is unique and ensures a varied gaming experience!
For example, there is the map Kelter, a faithful reconstruction of our homeland.

The game comes with 3 fundamentally different game modes: You can choose between the well-known Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch modes or compete in our self-designed, revolutionary Cat and Mouse mode! Here, one player takes on the role of the "cat", all others start as the "mouse". The aim is to defeat the cat armed only with knives. But be careful: If the cat hits you with a crossbow or axe, you end up in the cage and can only be freed by other mice with the hidden key. The cat wins, however, as soon as all the mice are caught.

Finally, there is a little surprise: We are currently working on the first expansion for Brothers of Battle.

This much can already be revealed: Get ready to whip up the gravel and master every curve!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: 4 Hardware-CPU-Threads – Intel® Core™ i5 750 oder höher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: min. 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 10400f
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 1050Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

short_description: Brothers of Battle is a turn-based first-person shooter that specializes entirely in multiplayer mode. Whether at a LAN party or with friends online, you can duel in 3 different modes and countless maps.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish
